1: <pb/><e>Bit yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>A eb chi aon oc Jehová yipok c'ul, lajan eb axca wal tzalan Sión c'am chi bili, tol ayc'al ec' yin tojbalk'inal. Caytu' yayji eb.</t>
2: <t>Axca yayji oc witzlak yinlak Jerusalén, caywal tu' yayji oc Jehová yinlak is conob tinani', c'al yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
3: <t>Man ok mayjok eb rey c'amoc yin tojolal bay tx'otx' tx'otx' ak'bil yuj Dios bay is conob; axa talaj chi yunej, a eb tojol tu', chi c'oli k'aytzen ba yin yobtakil.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, ak' a watx'c'ulalil bay eb watx' beybal, c'al eb chi yiajtek c'ulok yin tojolal.</t>
5: <t>Axa eb chi elcan yin a beybal, acantok eb bay satak eb yobtakwom. <pb/>¡Ayokab co junc'ulal ayon Israel on ti'!</t>
